thread.title: Jeremy Renner multi-tasks in new Remy Martin Ad
thread.title_full: Jeremy Renner multi-tasks in new Remy Martin Ad - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Jeremy Renner multi-tasks in new Remy Martin Ad
text:
"Avengers" hunk Jeremy Renner shows off his many talents in a new commercial for Rémy Martin.
The 44-year-old actor is the new spokesman for the cognac brand.
In the action-packed one minute clip, he’s seen hanging from a building, directing a movie, renovating a home, and performing onstage with a band.
Craig Barritt/Getty Images for Remy Martin Renner performed at party held in the Chelsea neighborhood of New York. When he’s not killing guys on the big screen, “The Town” and “Hurt Locker” star flips buildings for a living.
He and his business partner (actor Kristoffer Winters) have made millions off of their renovation business. " It's a tangible form of art to me. Structures and homes and lifestyles… it's nice to drive around Los Angeles and see tombstones, if you will, of moments of my life where I'm able to provide lifestyles for somebody else, and that they will last for a very long time — a lot longer than I'll exist. There's something quite gratifying about that," he told Yahoo TV last year.
Craig Barritt/Getty Images for Remy Martin Lucy Liu and Jeremy Renner at a recent party held in the Chelsea neigborhood of New York. He’s also planning on releasing an album.
 Recently Renner performed at a Rémy-sponsored soiree in Chelsea(with his friends from the band Brother Sal) where he covered The Animals “House of the Rising Sun.”
Also spotted at the party: Lucy Liu and “Orange Is The New Black” stars Uzo Uduba, Laverne Cox and Jackie Cruz.
mhood@nydailynews.com
